title: Sketches from Narragensett, Rhode Island.
description: Vertical rectangle.  Obverse: A standing man shown in profile turned toward right and raising a filled hay fork.  Place, year are written in pen bottom left.  High bottom margin.  Reverse, top: two lower parts of forelegs of a cow.  Center: a hind leg and neck and head with a yoke.  Bottom:  upper part of the left hind leg with a part of the udder.
name: Drawing
